game.name: Train Simulator: Somerset & Dorset Railway Route Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Somerset and Dorset Joint Railway (S&DJR) is a fondly remembered name in the minds of steam fans everywhere, and now you can drive along this wonderful railway line from the golden age of steam in Train Simulator.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Somerset and Dorset Joint Railway (S&DJR) is a fondly remembered name in the minds of steam fans everywhere, and now you can drive along this wonderful railway line from the golden age of steam in Train Simulator.
